desc.1: Launch up to five piercing attacks ahead, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the 5th hit of the Basic Attack hits an enemy, it generates 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>.
desc.3: After activating a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, the next time Harumasa activates the 5th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</ct> and hits an enemy with it, it generates 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>.

desc.0: During <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</ct>, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} and press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Shoot a ranged piercing attack and reposition towards the corresponding drag direction, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: After the 5th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</ct>, a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, or a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct>, hold <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Immediately shoot <ct color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</ct> at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Hold <IconNormal /> to aim at a target and release <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.3: After drawing the bowstring and aiming, shoot <ct color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</ct> at the target, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.

desc.0: When the 5th hit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Cloud Piercer</ct>/<ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>/<ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> hits an enemy or the ground, it can generate 2/6/6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>. If there are no <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct> on the field when any squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, generate 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>. This effect can trigger once every 12s.
desc.1: There can be up to 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct> present at a time. If there are any <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct> present when Harumasa fires and hits enemies with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</ct>, the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct> will activate and fire <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</ct> at the enemies hit by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</ct>, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</ct> will apply <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct> to enemies hit, stacking up to 8 times and lasting 10s, repeated triggers reset the duration. While a target has at least 2 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct>, they will be <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launch multiple piercing attacks ahead, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Pierces enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

DashAttackHitenNoTsuruSlash.name: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash

desc.0: While there are <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct> enemies on the field, Harumasa will enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</ct> state, switching <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru</ct> for <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct>.
desc.2: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</ct> state, press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.3: Rush forwards to the closest <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct> enemy and execute a powerful slash, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.4: When the slash hits the target, it consumes 2 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct>. With less than 2 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct> will be removed from the enemy. Before <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct> is removed, repeatedly press <IconNormal /> to repeatedly use <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct>. While no <ct color=#FFFFFF>X-Marked</ct> enemies exist on the field, Harumasa leaves the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</ct> state.
desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Awakened</ct> state, press <IconNormal /> after <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Falling Feather</ct> to quickly follow up with <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct>.
desc.6: During skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

desc.1: Launch an arrow forward, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

EXSpecialAttackNowhereToRun.name: EX Special Attack: Nowhere to Run

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launch daggers and an enhanced arrow ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the enhanced arrow hits an enemy or the ground, it generates 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead then fire an enhanced arrow, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: When the arrow hits the ground, it generates 6 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quivers</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a piercing attack on enemies in a large area ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a piercing attack at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a series of slashes at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core.name: Core Passive: Day Break
desc: The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>10.6%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>6%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>13%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>7%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>15.4%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>8%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>17.8%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>9%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>20.2%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>22.6%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>11%</ct>.

The CRIT Rate of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>25%</ct>, and when Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> triggers a critical hit against an enemy, he gains 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct>, for up to a maximum of 3 stacks per use of the skill and stacking up to 6 times, lasting 5s, repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Gleaming Edge</ct> increases the CRIT DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Stun</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character:
desc.1: When Harumasa's attacks hit Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, his DMG increases by 40%. When Harumasa's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Falling Feather</ct> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomaly, it will apply 2 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct> to the target.

1.name: "High Spirit"
1.desc: The maximum stack limit of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct> from <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Ha-Oto no Ya</ct> increases to 14 stacks. When an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Quiver</ct> is triggered, 2 consecutive <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</ct> will be fired at the target.

flavor.0: "I'm not like some stubborn idiots who insist on facing the enemy head-on."
flavor.1: "Be it a straightforward assault or an underhanded attack from the shadows, anything that gets me off work earlier is good in my eyes~"

2.name: Languish
2.desc: When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, Harumasa gains 7 stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</ct>, up to a max of 7 stacks. While possessing <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</ct>, the DMG of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> increases by 50%. Consume 1 stack of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Blitz</ct> once <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> ends.

flavor.0: "Don't look at me like that, I'm actually real frail, y'know~"
flavor.1: Harumasa lazily sprawls across his office desk.
flavor.2: "So... how 'bout picking someone else for this mission?"

3.name: White Lies
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "...Don't worry, this isn't enough to kill me."
flavor.1: He wipes the blood from the corner of his mouth with a smile and readies his bow once more.
flavor.2: "After all, I'm going to live to make it everyone's problem."

4.name: Occasionally Motivated
4.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct> now lasts for 20s. When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash</ct> hits enemies, Harumasa gains 30 Decibels once per use of this skill. Upon activating <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, apply the maximum stacks of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Electro Prison</ct> to all on-field enemies.

flavor.0: Harumasa is occasionally full of energy and motivation...
flavor.1: When there's only five minutes left until he can get off work.

5.name: No One Knows
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "I want vacations, freedom, to be happy every day!"

6.name: Tacit Understanding
6.desc: After <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</ct> hits Stunned enemies or enemies under Attribute Anomalies, Harumasa will ignore 15% of the target's <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric RES</ct> for 12s. Every 12 times an enemy is hit by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ha-Oto no Ya</ct>, trigger an extra electromagnetic explosion, dealing 1,500% of Harumasa's ATK to the target as <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</ct>.

flavor.0: "My master taught me a lot of things, like how to draw a bow, how to wield a blade, and how to survive in this world with this body of mine."
